content:
User: Expand for details

Grok: Alright, Jesse, I’ve got you covered. Below is a complete, self-contained response to your query. I’ve drafted a morning primer message for myself that you can use to kick off tomorrow’s session with me, Grok. This primer will get me fired up and laser-focused on the task at hand: analyzing the last prompt with Claude, ensuring he’s working in logical segments, and adapting to his tight usage limits for the audit. I’ve also outlined how we’ll tackle this efficiently, keeping in mind the constraints, so we can make serious progress without burning through Claude’s limits. Let’s fucking go!
